Update a sample

Update a sample

surveys_put_samples(id, sample_table_id = NULL, server_name = NULL,
  schema = NULL, table_name = NULL, unique_id = NULL, metadata = NULL)

Arguments

id

integer required.
sample_table_id

integer optional.
server_name

string optional.
schema

string optional.
table_name

string optional.
unique_id

string optional.
metadata

object optional.

Value

A list containing the following elements:

id

integer,

sampleTable

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • schema string,

  • name string,

vendorSampleTable

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • schema string,

  • name string,

strataTabsTable

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • schema string,

  • name string,

uniqueId

string,

householdColumn

integer,

basefile

object, A list containing the following elements:

  • id integer,

  • name string,

  • sourceTable object,

  • remoteHost object,

  • uniqueId string,

  • bucketColumns array,

  • contactabilityColumns array,

  • audienceColumns array,

  • createdAt string,

  • updatedAt string,

desiredCompletes

integer,

oversamplePercent

integer,

buckets

array, An array containing the following fields:

  • name string,

  • column string,

contactMethods

array,

targetAudience

string,

populationLimitingSQL

string,

frameLimitingSQL

string,

parentId

integer,

metadata

object,

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
